Package com.vuzix.hardware

Interface Summary
VuzixCamera.AutoFocusCallback Callback interface used to notify on completion of camera auto focus.
VuzixCamera.ErrorCallback Callback interface for camera error notification.
VuzixCamera.FaceDetectionListener Callback interface for face detected in the preview frame.
VuzixCamera.MetadataListener Callback interface for metadata.
VuzixCamera.OnZoomChangeListener Callback interface for zoom changes during a smooth zoom operation.
VuzixCamera.PictureCallback Callback interface used to supply image data from a photo capture.
VuzixCamera.PreviewCallback Callback interface used to deliver copies of preview frames as they are displayed.
VuzixCamera.ShutterCallback Callback interface used to signal the moment of actual image capture.
 

Class Summary
VuzixCamera The VuzixCamera class is essentially a copycat of the standard Camera class, extended with specific cpcam methods: takePicture( ..., shotParams); setBufferSource(); reprocess();
VuzixCamera.Area The Area class is used for choosing specific metering and focus areas for the camera to use when calculating auto-exposure, auto-white balance, and auto-focus.
VuzixCamera.CameraInfo Information about a camera
VuzixCamera.Face Information about a face identified through camera face detection.
VuzixCamera.Metadata Information about metadata values of an associated frame.
